title: Nabbed: A Newspaper Mystery
description: Thomas Weston knows his school needs its own newspaper. He’s even named it. But it’s not until his friend Leland comes to him when his cat disappears that Thomas knows what he must do – not only for his friend, but for the whole town.Thomas Weston has newspaper ink in his veins. He also has funny headlines running through his head 24/7. If he can convince the principal at Fairview Middle School he has what it takes, maybe, just maybe, he’ll be able to make his dream of school newspaper come true. But first he has to figure out why all the cats in Fairview are disappearing!
author: Michele Corriel
